name: Humble Crew Toy Storage Organizer with Top Shelf and 9 Removable Bins, Natural/White – Toddler Bookshelf with Toy Organizer - Modern Toy Rack Ideal for Kids' Rooms, Playrooms, and Nurseries
short_description: Plastic

Removable Toy Storage Bins: Includes 9 durable and interchangeable bins (6 standard, 3 large) for effortless organization and clean-up, making it an ideal toy storage organizer and children's toy storage solution for busy playrooms and nurseries.

Sturdy and Reliable: Built with a durable engineered wood frame and steel dowels, this organizer supports up to 20 lbs per level, making it perfect for large toy storage organizers and fulfilling all your kids' toy organizer needs. For ages 3 and up.

Chic and Practical: The sleek white finish, matching bins, and handy top shelf blend seamlessly into any bedroom, playroom, or nursery decor. With dimensions of 34"W x 16"D x 31"H, it adds elegance and provides ample storage and display space.

Designed for Safety: Thoughtfully equipped with stabilizing braces and a wall anchor anti-tip kit, this organizer ensures your child’s play space is as safe as it is fun. Rounded corners add an extra layer of protection for worry-free play.

Smart Space-Saving Design: With its multi-tiered shelves and top ledge, this organizer maximizes space and keeps everything in its place. Perfect for toy racks and toddler toy storage solutions, it brings order to chaos and style to any room.
product_description: Transform your child’s play area into a tidy, stylish, and functional space with the Humble Crew Toy Storage Organizer with Top Shelf and 9 Removable Bins. This modern toy and book organizer features a durable engineered wood frame and includes 6 standard-size and 3 large-size plastic bins for versatile storage of toys, books, art supplies, and more. Designed with both style and practicality in mind, this organizer includes a convenient top shelf—perfect for displaying decor, books, or frequently used items. The natural wood finish paired with clean white bins creates a modern, neutral look that complements nurseries, playrooms, and kids’ bedrooms alike. With built-in safety features like stabilizing braces, rounded corners, and a wall anchor anti-tip kit, this organizer offers peace of mind for parents while encouraging kids to take part in cleanup and organization. Ideal for children ages 3 and up, this compact and efficient design fits easily into small and large spaces alike.

name: Humble Crew Extra-Large Toy Organizer with 20 Plastic Bins – Grey/White Storage Rack with 4-Tier Shelves, Anti-Tip Safety, for Kids’ Rooms, Playrooms, Nurseries & Classrooms
short_description: 40% More Storage Capacity: Super-sized design offers significantly more space than standard organizers with 16 standard bins and 4 large bins—ideal for toys, books, crafts, and more.
Durable and Safe Design: Made with engineered wood and reinforced with steel dowels, includes stabilizing braces and anti-tip straps for added safety and strength.
Customizable and Removable Bins: Includes 20 BPA- and phthalate-free plastic bins (16 standard, 4 large) that can be repositioned or removed for quick access and cleanup.
Modern, Versatile Look: Neutral grey and white finish blends seamlessly into bedrooms, playrooms, living areas, and classrooms—stylish enough for both kids and adults.
Perfect for Growing Families: Ideal for children ages 3 and up, this organizer encourages responsibility and makes cleanup easy; great for organizing anything from toys to office supplies.
product_description: Upgrade your home organization with the Humble Crew Extra-Large 20-Bin Toy Organizer, the perfect solution for families needing more space and style. Offering 40% more storage than standard toy organizers, this four-tier unit features 16 standard bins and 4 large bins (equivalent to 8 standard bins) to handle everything from toys and books to art supplies and accessories. Crafted with a sturdy engineered wood frame, reinforced steel rods, and safety-enhancing stabilizing braces and anti-tip straps, this organizer is built to handle the hustle and bustle of daily play. Each level can support up to 20 pounds, ensuring long-lasting reliability. The removable plastic bins are easy for kids to use independently—fostering responsibility while keeping spaces neat. Measuring 51"W x 11"D (16"D with stabilizing braces) x 32"H, this versatile storage rack is ideal for nurseries, bedrooms, classrooms, mudrooms, or even home offices. Finished in a clean grey and white colorway, this unit complements any modern décor and grows with your family’s needs. Easy to assemble with all hardware included, the Humble Crew Extra-Large Organizer transforms chaos into calm in any room.

name: Toy Storage Organizer for Kids, 9-Bin Toy Organizer with 2-Drawers, Movable Toy Chest and Top Rack, Multifunctional Kids Bookshelf and Toy Storage for Playroom, Bedroom, Nursery, White
short_description: Solid Pine Wood：Unlike other melamine MDF toy storage organizers that are prone to problems such as unpleasant odors, warping and harming children，our toy shelf is made of natural solid pine wood and features a paint-free design, completely avoiding these issues, making it safer, stronger and more reassuring.

It is not only a kids storage rack with 9 white storage bins, but also has 2 storage drawers and a removable toy chest with 4 hidden wheels. Additionally,books,toys and other items can also be placed on the top of the our 4-in-1 kids bookshelf.

A Beginning of Good Habits:The toy organizers and storage is a great choice for children and it conforms to the educational philosophy of Montessori. Scientific zoning not only cultivates children's organizing abilities and habits but also enhances their hands-on skills and self-care abilities. Scattered toys can be put back in place at any time to avoid rummaging and confusion. In addition, there is a toy box with 4 hidden wheels and 1 handle that can be easily slid out,children can easily drag it to the play area to store their toys.

Simple Modern Design:The montessori shelf with its simple lines and the choice of classic solid colors make this multi-functional item blend with the decoration of any room. Whether placed in the bedroom, living room, playroom or nursery, the modern functional design of the toy storage shelf complements your existing furniture while providing an intelligent storage solution for growing up with your children.

Kid-Friendly Height & Safety：This wooden toy organizer with storage bins is designed for children.It has rounded edges and a smooth surface，which can prevent children from getting hurt by bumps. The two feet on the base make it more stable, less likely to shake or tip over, reducing the risk of injury.
